description: Master this healthier pizza recipe for the kids' lunch boxes. Simply pair the feta and veggie pizzas with a crispy chickpea mix and a banana.
name: Mini veggie pizza lunch boxes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Macro seed mix with pepitas and sunflower seeds
0.33 cup Woolworths light tasty shredded cheese

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, place pumpkin in a large microwavesafe bowl. Microwave for 1 minute on high until tender. Place pita bread on remaining tray and spread with ricotta. Top with pumpkin, tomato, onion and cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until base edges start to brown. Remove from oven and top with rocket. Serve pizzas in lunch boxes with chickpea mix and bananas.

Top with pumpkin, tomato, onion and cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until base edges start to brown. Remove from oven and top with rocket. Serve pizzas in lunch boxes with chickpea mix and bananas.
